TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
You should ask/watch ru tube in alternance with you tube (& etc. tube) to get a welded melting clue.

Waiter there's a matrix movie starting by 101 and ending by 303 in my soup.

Edited August 7, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
nevermind that's just a door

Hmm...maybe you'd prefer our 404 Not Found soup or maybe our 502 Bad Gateway instead.

Waiter, there's a [REDACTED] in my soup!

Edited August 7, 2014 by Mrsupersonic8
A team of highly trained monkeys has been dispatched to your location.

[DATA EXPUNGED]

Waiter, there's a Scientologist in my soup!

Uh...let me change that soup for you.

Waiter! There's a...uh....what is that?

Obey the message.

Waiter, there's a mushroom cloud in my soup!

Nevermind that, just some experimental spices going on there. Definitely no danger of radiation poisoning *ahem*

Waiter! There's SCIENCE in my soup!

We'll pack that up so you can take it home with you, Sir.

Waiter, there's a giant lizard in my soup.

Well, it's dead. I'm sure you wanted Giant Lizard Soup, right?

Waiter, there's apple cider in my soup!

Um, you're welcome.

Waiter, there's a cinder block in my soup.

No, that's soy bean curd.

Waiter, there's a microphone in my soup!

Does it work?

Waiter! There's a box in my soup! It say "Live snakes inside" on top of it and it is moving in circles...

Open it, see what happens.

Waiter! There's a camera in my soup!

It's... Uh.... A reality tv show? *whisper* CIA, we've been busted. *whisper*

There's a button quail on a air mattress swimming inside my soup! I ordered beef soup!

Oh dear, I think that was the chef's pet...we were serching for him all night!

Waiter, there's a phoenix feather in my soup, and it's making it catch fire!

No, the soup is oil. I don't think that's on the menu..

Waiter! There's a water dragon in my soup!

Oh, sorry for the mistake! It should have been a soup dragon.

Walter! There's a meth crystal in my soup!

So sorry! Let me get you a new, dry meth crystal.

Waiter!!! there's a shoe in my soup! And it's not the right size!!! >:-[

Congratulations. Your soup has *soul*.

Waiter, there's a delivery truck in my soup.

Well, how else are we supposed to serve soup?

Waiter!! There's liquid fuel in my soup!

I believe that is our rocket fuel soup. Let me get some oxidizer for you...

Waiter, there's a flash drive in my soup!

Crap! That's my KSP save!

Waiter, there's no water in my soup!

You ordered a tomato, sir.

Waiter, there's a slightly dirty fork in my soup, could you get me another one?

Nope. We're all out of forks that didn't coalesce into a fork demon. Oh hey, your fork is.. floating?

Waiter!! There's a fork demon in my soup!

We use those to clean the forks.

Waiter!! There's no fork in my soup!

You're not supposed to eat soup with forks.

Waiter, there's no water in my soup! I ordered the water soup!
